name: Kalgara
text: DON!!x1 When Attacking: Put a character with the (Shandorian Warriors) type from your hand into play that has a cost equal to or less than the number of Don!! you control. Then, if you played a card, put the top card of your life into your hand.

effect.text: Put a character with the (Shandorian Warriors) type from your hand into play that has a cost equal to or less than the number of Don!! you control. Then, if you played a card, put the top card of your life into your hand.
